document_data.mainbody: '''"Patronage"''' is a short story by [[David Cook]] included in the 1993 anthology ''[[Realms of Valor]]''. It revisits the lama [[Koja]] of [[Khazari]] from [[the Empires trilogy]].
document_data.Summary: Now based at the temple of Deneir in Procampur, Koja seeks to tell the truth about the Tuigan by writing and publishing a book based on his experiences, while he reminisces of his homeland of Khazari. Koja looks into printing his book and seeks funding from the city's nobles, before receiving a gift from a powerful benefactor.
